abstract: The Letters desk, responsible for publishing all letters to the editor, wants high school students to submit a letter in response to a news article, editorial, column or Op-Ed essay in The Times published in the past week. It will pick a selection of the best entries and publish them on May 31.

headline.main: One-Week Student Competition | Write a Letter to the Editor, for Publication in the Opinion Section
